name: Playground VR
description:
Playground VR It is an open world game where you can experience the beautiful essence of VR.
Do you want to fly a balloon? Fly! Are you not afraid of being fired from cannon? Launch yourself! Do you want to take to the sea waves? Swim! Do you want to climb the building? Freeway! Maybe some football? Get the ball rolling! Yes you can do it all!

This is Playground VR where you can freely do whatever you want!

Features:

  • A lot of vehicles (Even almost tesla car similar to autopilot)
  • Many different weapons (RPG, Guns, Lasers, Swords, bows)
  • Ability to play with ragdolls (We don't tell you to hit them right away, but maybe nobody will notice)
  • Uncountable amount of strange easter eggs and surprises
  • Ferris wheel (Please no silly ideas)
  • Realistic sea waves (Watch out!)
  • Exploring the city (That's what this game is all about)
  • Freedom (Nobody is standing over your head)
  • Possibility to slow down time (Then make explosions!)
  • Minigames (Basketball, parkour on time, scoring points on the motorboat)
  • Plenty of achievements to unlock (For example, don't jump off the roof)
  • Cannons (Guidance system, just take the aim (That's what she said))
  • Windmills (Eat a lot so you don't blow up)
  • Jetpacks (Do not fly off the map)
  • Too many places to visit (Office, Gym, Soccer field, a basketball court)

I'm not writing anything more! Just buckle up! And you have to see for yourself!
